description:
The Cat Eye AirGPS Bike Computer with Magnetless Cadence is a device that combines the features of the Cat Eye AirGPS Bike Computer and the Cat Eye CDC-30 Magnetless Cadence Sensor. It allows you to measure your speed, distance, time, and cadence without any additional sensors or magnets. It uses GPS and Glonass satellite networks to track your location and speed, and a magnetless sensor to detect your pedal rotations.

  • It connects wirelessly to your smartphone and your Cat Eye bike computer via Bluetooth and ANT+
  • You can customize your display settings, upload your ride data to various platforms, and enjoy a simple and hassle-free operation
  • The Cat Eye AirGPS Bike Computer with Magnetless Cadence is a sensorless GPS computer that enhances your cycling performance and experience
name: Cat Eye AirGPS Bike Computer with Magnetless Cadence
